title: From Maid to Mother - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Cute Story   European Ambience   Familiars   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Helpful Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Magic   Maids   Misunderstandings   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty
author: Yudzuki Seiya
description: A high school girl reincarnates in another world as Lily. While she occasionally reminisces about her past life, she is now known as “the Maid of the Royal Family,” after helping to rear the lady who eventually married the crown prince. One day, the court magician Leonard suddenly requests that she acts as a mother for his adopted daughter Jill.>
